value.name: Reserve deputy convicted in Eric Harris' death sees similarities to Daunte Wright's death
value.description: The recent death of Daunte Wright in Minneapolis by a police officer is similar to the 2015 shooting death of Eric Harris in Tulsa.

value.name: Residents angry after ICPD uses military-grade armored truck to serve warrants
value.description: Iowa City Police officers used a military-grade armored truck to serve warrants related to recent shootings Tuesday morning. While police say the operation went off without an incident, many people who saw it drive through their neighborhood say it was unnecessary and seriously hurts community relations.

value.name: OPINION | PHILIP MARTIN: Bullets and bad seeds
value.description: In the three weeks leading up to the Columbine High School massacre in 1999, Dylan Klebold and Eric Harris made several videotapes--nearly four hours' worth of footage--in which they talk about their plans.

value.name: America uprising: Scholars reflect on the death of George Floyd. Plus, 10 tips for journalists covering protests against police violence.
value.description: Nearly a dozen scholars on policing, economic and health inequality and media narratives reflect on the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis.

value.description: The clip is accompanied by the song "Stray Bullet" from rock band KMFDM. Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold, the students behind the 1999 Columbine High School massacre, also cited that group's lyrics.

value.name: Deputies on Scene
value.description: Fleeing Students Report Multiple Shooters When Gardner called for additional units to respond to the south parking lot of Columbine High School, he had just exchanged gunfire with Eric Harris.

value.name: At least nine dead, most of them children, in Russian school shooting
value.description: AT LEAST NINE people, most of them children, were killed Tuesday when a lone teenage gunman opened fire at a school in the central Russian city of Kazan, officials said. President Vladimir Putin ordered a review of gun control laws after the shooting — one of the worst in recent Russian history — which occurred on the first day back to school following annual May holidays.

value.name: At least seven dead in Russia school shooting
value.description: At least seven people were killed Tuesday, most of them children, in a shooting at a high school in the central Russian city of Kazan, officials and news agency reports said.

value.name: Nine dead in Russia school shooting
value.description: At least nine people, most of them children, were killed Tuesday when a lone teenage gunman opened fire at a school in the central Russian city of Kazan, officials said. President Vladimir Putin ordered a review of gun control laws after the shooting -- one of the worst in recent Russian history -- which occurred on the first day back to school following annual May holidays.

value.name: WATCH: Chaos as 9 dead in school shooting in central Russia
value.description: At least nine people were killed after shooting broke out Tuesday at a high school in the central Russian city of Kazan, local news agencies reported.
